titles.title: GAMBLER Act
GAMBLER Act
Giving Alien Migrants Back through Lawful Excise Redistribution Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish the Border Enforcement Trust Fund.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
